channel.title: Weapons
channel.description: Hi i was wondering if it is possible to make the bandos whip,and like dragon whip hit like a normal whip. not just like moving the chars arm but like a normal whip ukno??? lol anyways thanks if anyone knows =D

item.title: Weapons
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

just search “4151” in client.java and the parts that have “GFX” next to it, copy and paste that method below it and change item id to whips.

Read full topic

item.title: Weapons
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

yeah it’s called weapon animation… look into it. go to the modeling and client hacking topics and look around there. i’m sure that you’ll find a way to animate things like whips.

Read full topic
